initial_message.msg: A new face... name's {NAME}. I am the blacksmith around here, I take care of providing weapons and armour to our people. If you are in need of someone money let me know, since I can't exactly just abandon my work.

ref_id_0.msg: Nothing interesting, I was born in this area, my father was a blacksmith and introduced me to the work I do today. What's it to you anyway?

ref_id_1.msg: A person by the name of <name> was meant to bring me my payment for the repairs I did to his dagger and he hasn't shown up since. Find him for me and get my payment of '17 silver coins' by any means necessary. Try not to toughen him up too much.

ref_id_2.msg: Business is business, not much competition since I am the only blacksmith in the village, ha ha. So, if you've got the coin, you get yourself a price.
